pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets and Functions to Benchmark Neural Network Packages // Datasets and functions to benchmark (convergence, speed, ease of use) R packages dedicated to regression with neural networks (no classification in this version). The templates for the tested packages are available in the format of R, R Markdown and HTML files at https://github.com/pkR- pkR/NNbenchmarkTemplates and https://akshajverma.com/NNbenchmarkWeb/index.html.
